_error_validation_duplicate_identifier.c: A common error where the user declared two values using the same name. Expected to be user facing.
_error_validation_duplicate_parameter_na: An error which occurs when a duplicate name is used in defining a function. Expected to be user facing.
error_validation_invokeExpression_numArg: Expected between {numMin}-{numMax} arguments, but {numGiven} were given.
_error_validation_invokeExpression_numAr: An error when a function call was given either too few or too many arguments. Expected to be user facing.
error_validation_invokeExpression_missin: '{funcName}' is missing an argument for the non-optional parameter '{argName}'.
_error_validation_invokeExpression_missi: An error when a named function call is missing a mandatory argument. Expected to be user facing.
error_validation_invokeExpression_missin: Missing an argument for the non-optional parameter '{argName}'.
_error_validation_invokeExpression_missi: An error when an unnamed function call is missing a mandatory argument. Expected to be user facing.
error_validation_invokeExpression_typeMi: '{funcName}' expected the argument for '{argName}' to be '{expected}', but got '{actual}' instead.
_error_validation_invokeExpression_typeM: An error when a named function call is missing a mandatory argument. Expected to be user facing.
error_validation_invokeExpression_typeMi: Expected the argument for '{argName}' to be '{expected}', but got '{actual}' instead.
_error_validation_invokeExpression_typeM: An error when an unnamed function call is missing a mandatory argument. Expected to be user facing.
